name: team.integrationLogs
desc: Gets the integration logs for the current team.

app_id.desc: Filter logs to this Slack app. Defaults to all logs.

change_type.desc: Filter logs with this change type. Possible values are `added`, `removed`, `enabled`, `disabled`, and `updated`. Defaults to all logs.

service_id.desc: Filter logs to this service. Defaults to all logs.

team_id.desc: encoded team id to get logs from, required if org token is used.

user.desc: Filter logs generated by this user's actions. Defaults to all logs.
